extendedInfo.description: Safely stay connected on the road! Let Jarvis handle your text messages.Jarvis speaks the incoming text message and lets you send something back using voice commands.â¥PERSONALITY ADDEDâ¥Inspired by the iPhone's Siri, JARVIS now has its own conversational skills.Press the JARVIS head and say anything!**MORE COMMANDS COMING SOON (5/13/2012)**If you have any suggestions or find any bugs please let me know, as opposed to just leaving negative feedback. Thank you! paulmdemarco@gmail.comFEATURES:-Listen to incoming text messages-Speak your message back-Answer or Ignore incoming phone call with voice command-Extremely battery efficient, only runs when a text is received and closes immediately after session-Utilizes official Google engines for TTS and Voice RecognitionJARVIS PRO FEATURES:-Push the JARVIS head to wake-up for commands-Wake up Jarvis and hear your customized wake-up response.-Or, simply have a conversation with your robotCOMMAND LIST:"Send text to [contact name]""Call [contact name]""What time is it?""Cancel" at anytime to abort the commandâââââ "After 2+ years I found the MUST HAVE app. I was able to respond to a text from my realtor while driving I95. Hands-free text receipt & reply." -Robert Milk - ACC Board of Directorâââââ "Picked up all my incoming texts, and haven't noticed any affect on battery life." -Davidâââââ "Must have!!! Incredibly simple yet accurate. 100% win!!!" -RyanDIRECTIONS:-Open Jarvis and turn on-Jarvis will now run when a text message is received-Follow the yes or no prompts and respond to the message hands-free!-Upgrade to the PRO version and unlock the ability to initiate commands.TROUBLESHOOTING:"Nothing happens when I receive a text" - This is most likely due to another app installed on your device. Please follow the instructions below.SETUP INFO FOR GOSMS, HANDCENT, VLINGO USERS:-GO SMS >> Settings >> Advanced Tab >> Receive Settings >> uncheck "Disable other message notification"-HANDCENT >> Settings >> Application Settings >> Disable-VLINGO, Within phone settings, change voice recognizer from Vlingo to Google Voice.Have questions or feedback? paulmdemarco@gmail.com

reviews.title: Samsung galaxy young
reviews.comment: It seems to me the best app I\'ve ever used thank you the creator very very well done the coolest app but can you please tell me about the pro version specially the features I want to know about them answer me soon thank you
reviews.author: Shivam Sahu

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t identify words correctly and doesn\'t even know it\'s own commands, don\'t waste your money. You have to pay in app for the full version which is not worth it at all.
reviews.author: Joshua Lerma

reviews.title: Needs more work
reviews.comment: Galaxy note 2. Android 4.1.2.  Works as it should since latest updates.
reviews.author: Philip Whitehead

reviews.title: The best app ever
reviews.comment: This app is the best ever. Very accurate speech  recognition and its really cool to hear Jarvis voice!  Great job! Also customer service is very good!
reviews.author: Tony Lankford

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: Every time I open the application its getting auto crash... Very bad
reviews.author: Deepan raj

reviews.title: Used to love it still like it
reviews.comment: I sm giiving it three stars I used to love the app but would really like to be able to have jarvis stay listening in the background. I undestand that this drains battery but it was jice to just say jarvis and have him be able to call or text. Also I miss his old voice I now have a female voice on my new phone and dont know how to change this.
reviews.author: Nick Lahey

reviews.title: Galaxy Note II
reviews.comment: Was the coolest program so far. Works great. Very clear. Understands my speaking. Revised Review: With the latest version it no longer works with the Galaxy Note II. Very sad.  06/28/13. Getting better. I can hear Jarvis through my Jawbone ear piece but Jarvis cannot hear me to reply to texts. Still not 5 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great concept, but very limited
reviews.comment: Best part about it is the voice and it waking up to attempt to answer your question. Too bad it can\'t answer 99 percent of what you ask it. Changing the try again option to chat bot or Google now at least gives it some additional functionality but it really needs some updating for it to be worth the extra money you pay for the pro version.
reviews.author: Jesse Elkin

reviews.title: Just amazing
reviews.comment: Understands my speeking and is very clear
reviews.author: Fred Bautista

reviews.title: Good concept, voice recognition is spotty
reviews.comment: Native Google voice commands have no trouble understanding me, so I don\'t believe it\'s just my accent or manner of speaking, but Jarvis doesn\'t recognize most of what I say. Hopefully this app will continue to be improved on, because it has several good points
reviews.author: Travis Snarr

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I\'m impressed. Since the recent update, it has extremely improved. But, it does need to recognize commands just a little better. It doesn\'t seem to recognize some of the names in my contacts list, and I think \"George\" should be a relatively easy name to recognize. Other than that it\'s a very good app, and worth buying!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok...
reviews.comment: I love the idea. I upgraded to the Pro version for the other perks, and it works ok... The \"Wake up JARVIS\" command only works half the time. And when chatting JARVIS seems to just ramble. I understand that it isn\'t supposed to be able to have legit full on conversations, but proper grammar and word use would be nice. When in Car Mode it tells me there is a call and asks if I want to answer, but when I respond yes nothing happens and I have to do it myself. I love the concept but the program needs tweaking
reviews.author: Colter Cline

reviews.title: HTC One
reviews.comment: Would first off got to say much better than the first time I downloaded this. Now works amazingly and smooth the only one thing I would love is to be able to activate Jarvis from black lock screen and I have not try it yet or if you can but if he work with Bluetooth as well those options would be very useful and helpful.
reviews.author: Micheal Pattock

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work!
reviews.comment: Would be a great app, but it does not recognised any of my contact names, even though it repeats the correct name back to me!
reviews.author: Alexander Laws

reviews.title: What happened
reviews.comment: After the update, JARVIS no longer picks up my voice. Feels like I have to hold the phone to my mouth just to get a text out...even WITH the windows up. Can\'t say that makes me want to use the app while driving.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: I\'ve had the paid version since before the update, the update has some super features
reviews.author: Stefon Stilwell

reviews.title: Needs better update
reviews.comment: When i say yes to answer incoming calls. It Dnt work
reviews.author: Isaac Arnaldy

reviews.title: Update
reviews.comment: Update is awsome! Although he should keep it professional since I paid. Not \" Welcome back. Happy birthday kirby.\"
reviews.author: Tyler Baldauff

reviews.title: Vivek..(Sony xperia neo l )
reviews.comment: It doesn\'t even open ... Force closes..every time
reviews.author: vivek vardhan

reviews.title: Good but not jarvis
reviews.comment: Was hoping the voice sounded like jarvis... it doesn\'t
reviews.author: Julian Gemmell
